author: sethvs
body:
There are several copies (some 3, and some 4) of identical tests in Measure-Object.Tests.ps1.

For example:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fde00de77f48f4bd2eede46dc3ed4a812da0c2d6/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Measure-Object.Tests.ps1#L377-L381

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fde00de77f48f4bd2eede46dc3ed4a812da0c2d6/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Measure-Object.Tests.ps1#L448-L452

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fde00de77f48f4bd2eede46dc3ed4a812da0c2d6/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Measure-Object.Tests.ps1#L522-L526

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fde00de77f48f4bd2eede46dc3ed4a812da0c2d6/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Measure-Object.Tests.ps1#L595-L599

Do we need them?

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #12683, which has now been successfully released as `v7.1.0-preview.4`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.1.0-preview.4)

title: Several copies of identical tests in Measure-Object.Tests.ps1
